mapper.select: select to_char(createtime,'dd') as date_str,sum(fee_value)/100 as income from t_count_income t where t.createtime >= #{findDto.leftDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.createtime < #{findDto.rightDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.status=1 group by to_char(createtime,'dd') order by to_char(createtime,'dd')

select to_char(createtime,'hh24') as date_str,sum(fee_value)/100 as income from t_count_income t where t.createtime >= #{findDto.leftDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.createtime < #{findDto.rightDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and t.status=1 group by to_char(createtime,'hh24') order by to_char(createtime,'hh24')
